_comment: Keep file encoded with UTF-8 to support chat formatting http://minecraft.gamepedia.com/Formatting_codes
error.endertanks.bucket.nolink1: Kann Eimer nicht verknüpfen, das ist nicht dein Tank
error.endertanks.bucket.nolink2: Kann Eimer nicht verknüpfen, Tank Besitzer ist unbekannt
error.endertanks.bucket.nolink3: Can not link bucket, you're not on the same team
error.endertanks.tank.public.disabled: Public tanks are disabled, tanks must be upgraded to use
error.endertanks.tank.private.disabled: Creation of private tanks is disabled
error.endertanks.tank.team.disabled: Creation of team tanks is disabled
error.endertanks.tank.private.denied: Only the owner can preform that action
error.endertanks.tank.team.denied: Only team members can preform that action
error.endertanks.tank.upgrade_used: That upgrade item can only be applied once per tank
error.endertanks.bucket.private.disabled: Creation of private buckets is disabled
error.endertanks.bucket.team.disabled: Creation of team buckets is disabled
